title: Ep. 964 - The Left Tries To Sabotage 'What Is A Woman' Premiere But Fail Miserably
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, the premiere of my film What Is A Woman is an enormous success, no thanks to the cyberattack meant to shut the film down. The Left really doesn’t want you to see this movie. I’ll explain why. Also, NASCAR again bends the knee to the woke mob. Amber Heard officially puts the last nail in the Me Too coffin. Abusive parents explain how their two year old daughter chose her own gender. And in our Daily Cancellation, a trans activist explains why you are morally obligated to be sexually attracted to trans people. 

Yesterday, Daily Wire presented my new documentary “What Is A Woman?” Watch now at whatisawoman.com. 

I am a beloved LGBTQ+ and children’s author. Reserve your copy of Johnny The Walrus here: https://utm.io/uevUc.

Join Matt and the Daily Wire crew for Backstage Live At The Ryman on June 29th. Get your tickets now: https://utm.io/uezFr 

—
